enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
section_title: RESEARCH NEEDS RELATING TO THE CONVENTION
sentences: In the morning, delegates met in informal consultations to draft SBSTA conclusions and COP decisions, which were later presented to the contact group.

Co-Chairs Castellari and Cigarán presented the two draft texts, noting that these were based on previous conclusions and discussions held since SB 16, and that the draft texts aimed to establish dialogue between the research community and SBSTA.
In the draft conclusions, SBSTA stresses the need for research into technologies for mitigation and adaptation to climate change.
After making minor editorial changes, delegates agreed to the draft SBSTA conclusions and draft COP decisions.
